I used the generate_mat.py program to write the mat.in file using the random python package. 
In mat.in and mat.out files i have the test for 110 000 matrices. 
And these are some other examples:

6x9:101000000000001010010100100101110110101110010101110010
6x7:011101111110001100000001010101111001110110
8x9:100011000011111101101000011111000101100000101101010011011111001101101011
10x7:1101000110010111110010111011110100100010001001111010000111010001001001
5x10:11100001110010101110110101101011001101110010100001
5x8:0011110110011110001011100110110011011100
10x9:110011010100001010001001110010000010101011110100110010001111001100001010110110100101011010
7x10:0111011010011110011010100011010111101000010100010110011110111010000111
10x6:001010111001110101101001000000100110111111100001111000111101
7x7:1011101111110110100011000010011000100010001011100
